const response = await client.search({
  index: 'bank',
  body: {
    size: 0,
    aggs: {
      group_by_state: {
        terms: {
          field: 'state.keyword',
          order: {
            average_balance: 'desc'
          }
        },
        aggs: {
          average_balance: {
            avg: {
              field: 'balance'
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
})
console.log(response)
